axioms.project_goal: Build a verifiable, local-first meta-oversight architecture that prevents epistemic DARVO between user and AI during technical co-creation.
axioms.epistemic_rule: Only claims that pass deterministic validation (unit tests, cryptographic verification, mathematical proof, or direct observation) may be treated as established.
axioms.observer_principle: The Observer never trusts confidence scores from probabilistic models. It trusts only binary outcomes from sandboxed execution.
